div.head: 夜不能臥
div.div: inability to lie down to sleep at night

bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

entry.def: inability to lie down to sleep at night

sense.def: Illness Sign identical with bu de wo 不得臥

b) , inability to lie down. Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Substance Entry can 蠶 quoting Rui zhu tang jing yan fang 瑞竹堂經驗方 不能睡臥 , “Unable to lie down to sleep”, writes: 夜不能臥 , “ Inability to lie down to sleep at night”.
